subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Nibali finished the 152-mile race from Bergamo to Como, Italy, 21 seconds ahead of Daniel Moreno of Spain and 32 ahead of Thibaut Pinot of France.
snippet: Nibali finished the 152-mile race from Bergamo to Como, Italy, 21 seconds ahead of Daniel Moreno of Spain and 32 ahead of Thibaut Pinot of France.
